content.text: Ideaman is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is the Staff Officer of Planning. His name and status are only mentioned in the first databook.

Ideaman is an average-sized man, with tan skin and purple hair that juts out of his head, with a tiny orange ball on the end, similar to an Angler Fish and its light. He wears an orange and black striped shirt.
He seems to care about his crew mates, as he showed great concern when Pearl was knocked down by a rebound of Luffy's attack.
He appears to be a great strategist as he holds the title "Staff Officer of Planning".
Ideaman was first seen during the fight between Sanji and Pearl.
